section.heading: Cancellation when licensee has been evicted from the licensed premises.

para.text: If the Board, after an investigation, but before a hearing, has cause to believe that a licensee has been evicted from the premises or has otherwise vacated the premises and an application for safekeeping or transfer to a new location or person has not been submitted, the Board shall issue an order cancelling the license after providing the licensee with written notice and 30 days to submit a written request to the Board to hold a hearing.
The order shall be served on the licensee in person, by certified mail, or by e-mail at an e-mail address in ABRA's records.
